page.title: 13THE NEWS IN 1985.
page.content: People receive the daily news from the local papers and television.At Bradford City football ground a fire broke out in the stand.The police say it was started by a cigarette,56 people died. In Ethiopia people are dying of starvation,a pop group called Bandaid were raising money by releasing a record.'The Fox' is a man who was terrorising everybody.In 1985 he was put in jail for life six times over.'The Fox' is known for murder,rape,burglary and attacking young girls. In 1984,the miners were on strike.Many of those in Notts. did not strike and the N.U.M.offices in our area were the scene of demonstrations which closed Berry Hill Middle School for one day.
